class_notes: This class meets in person TTh, with an additional in-person Friday session at the same time in a location TBA.
course_description: This course is designed to help students reach intermediate-level communicative skills, both in spoken and written Chinese, and to establish a solid base for more advanced language learning. For non-heritage speakers only.
